name: meditate
desc: Meditate for 30 minutes to clear your mind

name: write
desc: Write down your frustrations. Documenting your thoughts can be very therapeutic

name: outside
desc: Go outside to get some fresh air for a few mins

desc: Read a good book for an hour

desc: Organize your work or living space

name: shower
desc: Take a shower or a bath

name: breathe
desc: Breathing exercises are a real thing! Backed by science, they calm down the body. Just breathe

name: exercise
desc: Blow off some steam! Exercise is one of the healthiest ways to do that

name: movie
desc: It's amazing how a good movie can distract the mind and relax the body
